messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] My first web page
messages.msgSnippet: Hey!  That was fun!   We need to see some pictures of you, though. My son wanted to go to one of the protests near us, (Montana)  but we ve lately had trouble
messages.messageBody:
Hey! That was fun! We need to see some pictures of you, though.
My son wanted to go to one of the protests near us, (Montana) but we've
lately had trouble with our car, and didn't want to travel that far. No
one else we know in our conservative little bomb 'em all and let God sort
'em out town was going.
I looked for a wild British woman on the news when they showed the DC
protest, but I didn't spot you.<g>
You and Marji should have been holding signs with your names on them for
your fans who couldn't make it.
Maybe that was you with the "FECK YOU BUSH" sign? <g>
I liked the picture of your daughter.

Deb L
